title: Print a Benchy
description: Welcome to the world of 3D printing! This interactive experience offers you a chance to test your new printer's capabilities with a free schematic for printing Benchy, a popular test print shaped like a boat. Simply choose your options as the dialogue unfolds to receive the schematic and start printing. Join the community of 3D printing enthusiasts and see what your printer can do!

dialogue.text: Congratulations on getting your 3D printer! To help you get started, we'd like to give you a free schematic for printing Benchy, a popular test print shaped like a boat. It's a great way to test your printer's capabilities.

options.text: Great, I'm interested in printing Benchy!
No thanks, I don't want to print Benchy right now.

dialogue.text: Awesome! Here's the schematic you need to print Benchy. Happy printing!
No problem, if you change your mind later, feel free to come back and get the schematic.
